Check input forecast file values

Source: R/check_forecast.R
check_forecast.Rd

Ensure that the forecast.ss file is configured for use in ss3sim.

check_forecast(for_list)

Arguments

for_list

A Stock Synthesis forecast list object as read in from SS_readforecast in the r4ss package.

Value

A an augmented list object, as returned by r4ss::SS_readforecast(), is invisibly returned.

Details

  • fish at \(F_{MSY}\)

  • use relative benchmark years (i.e., Bmark_years)

  • use relative years for fishing specifications, i.e., Fcast_years

Author

Kelli F. Johnson

Contents

Developed by Kelli F. Johnson, Sean C. Anderson, Kathryn L. Doering, Cole C. Monnahan, Christine C. Stawitz.
